text: (pasuva deviyan vahansē) “ō ādam! oba mēvāyē nāmayan ovunṭa dænum denu” yayi pævasuvēya. ohu ovunṭa ēvāyē nam dænum dun avasthāvēdī, ohu (malāyikāvarunṭa) “bhūmiyehida ahashida (obaṭa) san̆gavā æti dæya niyata vaśayenma mā hon̆din dæna siṭinneku yayi mā obaṭa pævasuvē nædda? ebævin oba (ādam gæna) eḷidarav kaḷa dæyada, san̆gavā gat dæyada niyata vaśayenma mā hon̆din dannemi” yayi kīvēya
